T02D3550:185a-1: pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3550:185a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3550:185a-4: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3550:185a-5: shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis med //
T02D3550:185a-6: ye shes de ni de bzhin gshegs //
T02D3550:185a-7: bsgrub bya'i don de sbyar ba yis //
T02D3550:185a-8: gzhung lam dag la de yi sgra //
T02D3550:185a-9: byang chub sa bon bla na med //
T02D3550:185a-10: shes rab pha rol phyin btud nas //
T02D3550:185a-11: gnyis med ye shes bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D3550:185a-12: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02D3550:185a-13: dang po re zhig sngags pas mnyam par gzhag par gyur pas /
T02D3550:185a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub pa yid la byas te /
T02D3550:185a-15: tsandan gyi mandal byas nas da'i yan lag ngo bo
T02D3550:185a-16: nyid med pa'i rang bzhin gyis de la dbus su
T02D3550:185a-17: mi bskyod pa bltas nas me tog dbul bar bya'o
T02D3550:185a-19: aom na mo aaksho bhya h'um aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3550:185a-20: de bzhin du aa ksho bhya dh'um zhes pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge brjod par bya'o //
T02D3550:185a-22: aom badzra dh'u pe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3550:185a-23: aom badzra gandhe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3550:185a-24: aom badzra d'i pe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3550:185a-25: aom badzra ne bi dhye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3550:185b-0: zhes pas @185b thams cad dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3550:185b-1: de'i mdun du aom na mo bee ro tsa n'a ya aom /
T02D3550:185b-2: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3550:185b-4: de bzhin du g-yas phyogs su aom na mo ratna sambha b'a ya tr'am /
T02D3550:185b-5: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3550:185b-7: aom na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya hr'i:aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3550:185b-8: de bzhin du g-yon du aom na mo aa mo
T02D3550:185b-9: gha siddhi ye aa: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a
T02D3550:185b-11: rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dag
T02D3550:185b-12: gi dbus su lha mo spyan ma la mchod par
T02D3550:185b-13: bya'o // aom na mo lo tsa n'a ye l'am aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3550:185b-14: de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02D3550:185b-15: 'od dpag med dag gi dbus su /
T02D3550:185b-16: aom na mo m'a ma kyee mam aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3550:185b-17: yang 'od dpag med dang don yong grub pa dag
T02D3550:185b-18: gi dbus su aom na mo p'anda r'a ye p'am
T02D3550:185b-19: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3550:185b-20: yang don yod grub pa dang rnam par snang mdzad
T02D3550:185b-21: dag gi dbus su aom na mo st'a ra yee
T02D3550:185b-22: t'am aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3550:185b-23: de nas mi bskyod pa'i gnas su ;
T02D3550:185b-24: aom na mo pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a ye dh'i:aom badzra pu shpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3550:185b-25: zhes pas thams cad la me tog la sogs pa lan gsum dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3550:185b-26: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3550:185b-27: zhes pas lha mo mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D3550:185b-28: pas mchod par bya'o zhes pa ni mandal gyi las
T02D3550:185b-29: so// da ni de nyid bsam par bya ste /
T02D3550:185b-30: 'dir sems can rnams srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs
T02D3550:185b-31: kyis mnar zhing yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khor
T02D3550:185b-32: te / kye ma 'di rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes
T02D3550:185b-33: snying rje'i sems bskyed cing de nyid bsam par bya'o
T02D3550:185b-34: te / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D3550:185b-35: pa'i rnal 'byor pas bla na med pa yang dag
T02D3550:185b-36: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas de rnams kyang
T02D3550:185b-37: bdag gis de la dgod cing ji ltar de rnams
T02D3550:185b-38: kyang slar yang sdug bsngal med cing 'khor ba las
T02D3550:185b-39: grol zhing bde bar yang bya'o zhes pa ni smon
T02D3550:185b-40: pa sems bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D3550:185b-41: de nas grang gi snying gar na bun gyi do
T02D3550:185b-42: shal can dbang phyug dgod pa lta bur dkar zhing
T02D3550:185b-43: bdud rtsi'i tshogs lta bu'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bltas
T02D3550:185b-44: la / de la dh'i:yig gser gyi kha dog lta
T02D3550:185b-45: bu las 'od zer dpag tu med pa brgya stong
T02D3550:185b-46: gi sgron mas stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D3550:185b-47: na sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa byed pa khrag
T02D3550:186a-0: khrig brgya stong dpag tu med @186a * //
T02D3550:186a-2: 'dir de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang /
T02D3550:186a-3: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams dang /
T02D3550:186a-4: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang dpag tu med pa'i me tog dang /
T02D3550:186a-10: glang po rin po che dang /
T02D3550:186a-12: bud med rin po che dang /
T02D3550:186a-13: skyes bu rin po la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang ste /
T02D3550:186a-14: 'di rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /
T02D3550:186a-16: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang nam mkha' la yid
T02D3550:186a-17: las skyes pa'i me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D3550:186a-18: mchod par bya'o // bdag nyid dbul ba dang /
T02D3550:186a-19: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3550:186a-21: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba rnams bya'o //
T02D3550:186a-22: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
T02D3550:186a-23: spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyang nam mkha' la spro zhing bsdu ba thun mtshams med par bya'o //
T02D3550:186a-24: de bzhin du bsgom pa ni 'jug pa'i sems bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D3550:186a-25: de nas aom sva bh'a wa shuddha ssarba dharm'a sv'a h'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D3550:186a-26: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bklag par bya'o //
T02D3550:186a-27: de la bdag nyid gcig pu bzhin du blta zhing
T02D3550:186a-28: bar snang la 'phro bzhin pa'i bdud rtsi'i tshogs pa
T02D3550:186a-29: bzhin du dri ma med cing zla ba yongs su
T02D3550:186a-30: gang ba lta bu cha shas kyi tshogs pa thams
T02D3550:186a-31: cad yongs su gang ba 'bar zhing 'bar ba bltas
T02D3550:186a-32: nas de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra
T02D3550:186a-33: sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3550:186a-35: bdag nyid bltas nas gzugs med cing 'du shes kyi rang bzhin med pa ste /
T02D3550:186a-36: 'on kyang 'od zer gyi tshogs pa lta bu 'ba'
T02D3550:186a-37: zhig 'phro ba zhes de bzhin du bsams nas yang
T02D3550:186a-38: aa yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil
T02D3550:186a-39: 'khor la de nas dh'i:yig de dang 'dra ba bsams
T02D3550:186a-40: nas / de yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs padma /
T02D3550:186a-41: de'i dbus su ha yig bltas la aa yig la
T02D3550:186a-42: sogs pa dbyangs yig bcu drug gis bskor ba la
T02D3550:186a-43: de bzhin du ka yig la sogs pa'i yi ge
T02D3550:186a-44: sum cu rtsa gnyis ha yig la sogs pa thams
T02D3550:186a-46: de bzhin du de'i 'dab ma la sgeg mo ngang /
T02D3550:186b-3: dri chab ma ste rnal 'byor ma brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D3550:186b-4: de thams cad kyang yongs su gyur pa las ye shes kyi zla ba bskyed de /
T02D3550:186b-5: de las skyes pa'i padma la /
T02D3550:186b-6: de'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pusti'o //
T02D3550:186b-7: slar yang de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02D3550:186b-8: de'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pusti gnyis pa'o //
T02D3550:186b-9: slar yang de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3550:186b-10: sna tshogs padma la bzhugs pa chos 'chad kyi phyag
T02D3550:186b-11: rgya can gser gyi mdog lta bu yan lag thams
T02D3550:186b-12: cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rgyan
T02D3550:186b-13: du mdzad pa / yang g-yon dang g-yas na autpa
T02D3550:186b-14: la dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D3550:186b-15: phyin pa'i pusti gnyis pa bsnams pa /
T02D3550:186b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D3550:186b-17: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sras kyis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D3550:186b-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nye bar 'khrungs pa ste /
T02D3550:186b-19: de lta bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3550:186b-20: gang gi tshe bsam gtan mi nus na de'i tshe sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3550:186b-23: bzlas pa'i dus su yang dpral bar aom yig ser por bltas bar bya'o //
T02D3550:186b-24: de bzhin du mgrin par a'a:yig dkar po'o //
T02D3550:186b-25: yang thugs kar dh'i:yig ser po'o //
T02D3550:186b-26: yang lte bar h'um yig sngon po'o //
T02D3550:186b-28: shes rab pha rol phyin ma yi //
T02D3550:186b-29: lha mo 'di bzhin sgom byed pa //
T02D3550:186b-30: blo ldan gang zhig kun mkhyen gyi //
T02D3550:186b-32: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs
